employment_type.title: Type of Employment
employment_type.description: The type of employment must be clearly stated, indicating whether the position is for full-time, part-time, casual, or daily hire

employer_identification.title: Employer Identification
employer_identification.description: The employer's name must be clearly stated for casual employment positions

work_streams.title: Work Streams
work_streams.description: The position must specify the relevant work streams that define the scope of work

activities.title: Activities and Tasks
activities.description: The position must detail the specific activities and tasks to be performed

frequency.title: Activity Frequency
frequency.description: Each activity must specify its frequency (daily, weekly, or monthly)

requirements.title: Position Requirements
requirements.description: The position must specify safety, equipment, and supervision requirements

safety.title: Safety Requirements
safety.description: Mandatory safety requirements for the position

equipment.title: Equipment Requirements
equipment.description: Required equipment and tools for the position

supervision.title: Supervision Level
supervision.description: Required level of supervision for the position
